doc:
Hope Holiday https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hope_Holiday 0 Hope Holiday (November 30, 1930) is an American actress, perhaps best known for her role of Mrs. Margie MacDougall, Jack Lemmon's partner in self-pity on Christmas Eve night, in the Billy Wilder film The Apartment (1960). Hope_Holiday ( November_30_,_1930 ) is an_American_actress , perhaps_best_known for her_role of Mrs._Margie_MacDougall , Jack_Lemmon 's_partner in self-pity on Christmas_Eve_night , in the_Billy_Wilder_film The_Apartment ( 1960 ) .
